title-group.article-title: CONVERGENCE OF APPROXIMATION SCHEMES FOR NONLOCAL FRONT PROPAGATION EQUATIONS

abstract.p: We provide a convergence result for numerical schemes approximating nonlocal front propagation equations. Our schemes are based on a recently investigated notion of a weak solution for these equations. We also give examples of such schemes, for a dislocation dynamics equation, and for a FitzHugh-Nagumo type system.
